title: Material) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 384 of 2011) are amended in Regulation
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 
(Marketing of Fruit Plant Propagating Material) (Amendment) Regulations
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (marketing fruit plant propagating material) (amendment) regulation

title: Material) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 384 of 2011) are amended in Regulation
Material) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 384 of 2011) are amended in Regulation
heading: 2. The European Communities (Marketing of Fruit Plant Propagating
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Marketing of Fruit Plant Propagating 
Material) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 384 of 2011) are amended in Regulation 
2(1) by substituting for the definition of “Directive” (as amended by European 
Communities (Marketing of Fruit Plant Propagating Material) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. 29 of 2020), the following – 

“‘Directive’ means Council Directive 2008/90/EC of 29 September 
20082 (as amended by Regulation (EU) No 652/2014 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 15 May 20143, Commission 
Implementing Decision (EU) 2016/159 of 4 February 20164, 
Commission Implementing Decision (EU) 2016/1887 of 24 October 
20165 and Commission Implementing Decision (EU) 2019/120 of 24 
January 20196, Commission Implementing Directive 2014/96/EU of 
15 October 20147, Commission Implementing Directive 2014/97/EU 
of 15 October 20148 and Commission Implementing Directive 
2014/98/EU of 15 October 20149 (as amended by Commission 
Directive (EU) 2020/177 of 11 February 2020); ”. 

1 OJ L41, 11.02.2020, p.1 
2 OJ L267, 08.10.2008, p.8 
3 OJ L189, 27.06.2014, p.1 
4 OJ L31, 06.02.2016, p. 51 
5 OJ L291, 26.10.2016, p.15 
6 OJ L24, 28.01.2019, p. 26 
7 OJ L298, 16.10.2014, p.12 
8 OJ L298, 16.10,2014, p.16 
9 OJ L298, 16.10,2014, p.22 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th June, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3. The European Communities (Marketing of Fruit Plant Propagating 

Material (Amendment) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 29 of 2020) are revoked. 

[199] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 May, 2020. 

MICHAEL CREED, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [199]

title: Material) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 384 of 2011) are amended in Regulation
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2020/177 by amending Council Directive 2008/90/EC as it 
relates to inspections for Union regulated non-quarantine pests (RNQPs) and 
measures intended to prevent their presence on fruit plant propagating material 
and fruit plants intended for planting. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [199] 5
